Chen Agreement · The TOOMwn Page
Chen Agreement

This agreement refers to a deal between party 1 (Ed) and party 2 (Chen). The stipulations are as follows:

What Chen gets

  • Continued membership of the town (unless voted out(unlikely though))
  • The policies and laws of the town, enacted after the 26th of May 2023 do not necessarily apply to Chen. For example, if a law is passed requiring all town members to put on their index page the phrase “this is an example”, then Chen is not required to do so.

## What Ed gets

  • Christian can not form political parties in the town.
  • Christian can no longer run for the office of mayor in the town.
    • This status will apply for life, that is he cannot leave the server and then rejoin to absolve him of this status.

Relevant Statistics

Party 1: Ed

Party 2: Chen

Party 1 Status: Approved

Party 2 Status: Processing or unknown

Status: Processing or unknown
